Are you looking for a loyal companion?

Our Cats

Our mission

At Whiskers of Wisdom, we believe that every cat deserves love, comfort, and companionshipâ€”especially in their golden years. Our shelter is dedicated exclusively to senior cats, offering them a peaceful, nurturing environment where they can thrive. Whether they've been surrendered, rescued, or simply outlived their previous families, these wise whiskered souls find a second chance with us.

Care

Close work with veterinarians ensures that all cats in our care receive essential medical care and expert health monitoring.

Pro tips

Rehoming

Our careful evaluations ensures that each cat is matched with a loving home that meets their unique needs and personality.

Adoption

Support

We provide guidance, resources, and assistance to ensure a smooth transition and lasting bond after adoption.

Are you prepared?

  • Litter box and litter
    Choose the right size and type for your home and the cat's comfort.

  • Food and water bowls
    Preferably stainless steel or ceramic, as they're easier to clean and more hygienic.

  • Cat food
    Ask us about the cat's current diet to avoid sudden changes.

  • Cat carrier
    For safe transport from the shelter and future vet visits.

  • Scratching post or pad
    Essential for claw care and protecting your furniture.

  • Bedding or cozy blanket
    A comfortable, quiet place for your cat to rest and feel safe.

  • Toys and enrichment items
    To keep your cat mentally and physically stimulated.

  • Grooming tools
    Brushes, nail clippers, or combs depending on the cat's coat type.

  • ID tag and/or microchip
    In case the cat gets lost (check if the shelter already microchipped them).

  • Veterinarian contact
    Have a vet lined up for a check-up and ongoing care.

And most important:

Time and patience - Your new cat will need time to adjust to their new home and routine.
